question: Hi,I am a diabetes also i have kidney stones since last  3 to 4 months, my problem is when i have sex with my wife i get severe pain in my head, it looks like some of my nerve in the brain is getting pulled. Doctor please tell me what is the reason behind this. I am 37 years old and since 4 years i found out to be diabetic, my father also had diabetic.Please suggest me what to do.Thanks
title: Getting pain in the head while having sexual intercourse
